level.heading: Appropriations.
level.text: Funds may be appropriated as necessary to carry out this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of § 4-519, see § 202(e) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-243
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-243, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-501.
